Question
========

Given the following numbers in a sample: 7, 1, 4, 8, 7, 3. The 95% confidence interval for the mean of the population from which the sample was drawn is:

Answerlist
----------

* <2.81; 7.19 >
* <2.49; 7.51 >
* <2.79; 7.21 >
* <2.11; 7.89 >

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* <2.81; 7.19 >: Incorrect
* <2.49; 7.51 >: Incorrect
* <2.79; 7.21 >: Incorrect
* <2.11; 7.89 >: Correct
